TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IEntityChangeTracker

summary.span: 개체 서비스에서 개체의 속성에 대한 변경 내용을 추적하는 데 사용되는 기능을 정의합니다.

span.span: Defines the facilities that are used by Object Services to track changes that are made to the properties of an object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 및 는 엔터티 데이터 모델 도구에서 생성된 엔터티 형식 및 복합 형식에 대한 기본 클래스입니다. and are the base classes for entity types and complex types generated by the Entity Data Model tools. 두 기본 클래스 모두 를 사용하여 속성 변경 내용을 보고합니다.Both base classes use to report property changes. 자세한 내용은 [Id 확인, 상태 관리 및 변경 내용 추적](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3bd49311-0e72-4ea4-8355-38fe57036ba0) 하 고 [POCO 엔터티의 변경 내용 추적](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/52d2fc77-5c87-4082-a8e2-a2952ceb8461)합니다.For more information, see [Identity Resolution, State Management, and Change Tracking](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3bd49311-0e72-4ea4-8355-38fe57036ba0) and [Tracking Changes in POCO Entities](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/52d2fc77-5c87-4082-a8e2-a2952ceb8461).

MemberSignature.Value: public void EntityComplexMemberChanged (string entityMemberName, object complexObject, string complexObjectMemberName);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void EntityComplexMemberChanged(string entityMemberName, object complexObject, string complexObjectMemberName) cil managed
Public Sub EntityComplexMemberChanged (entityMemberName As String, complexObject As Object, complexObjectMemberName As String)
public: void EntityComplexMemberChanged(System::String ^ entityMemberName, System::Object ^ complexObject, System::String ^ complexObjectMemberName);
abstract member EntityComplexMemberChanged : string * obj * string -> unit

param.name: entityMemberName
param.span: 변경된 엔터티 형식 복합 속성의 이름입니다.

span.span: The name of the complex property of the entity type that has changed.
The complex type that contains the property that changed.

param.name: complexObjectMemberName
param.span: 복합 형식에 대해 변경된 속성의 이름입니다.

span.span: The name of the property that changed on complex type.

summary.span: 변경 추적 장치에 복합 형식 속성이 변경되었음을 알립니다.

span.span: Notifies the change tracker that a property of a complex type has changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 는 에서 속성이 변경되었음을 보고하는 데 사용됩니다. is used by to report that a property has changed. 자세한 내용은 [Id 확인, 상태 관리 및 변경 내용 추적](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3bd49311-0e72-4ea4-8355-38fe57036ba0) 하 고 [POCO 엔터티의 변경 내용 추적](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/52d2fc77-5c87-4082-a8e2-a2952ceb8461)합니다.For more information, see [Identity Resolution, State Management, and Change Tracking](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3bd49311-0e72-4ea4-8355-38fe57036ba0) and [Tracking Changes in POCO Entities](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/52d2fc77-5c87-4082-a8e2-a2952ceb8461).

span.span: Notifies the change tracker of a pending change to a complex property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 은 및 에서 복합 속성이 변경 중임을 보고하는 데 사용됩니다. is used by and to report that a complex property is changing. 자세한 내용은 [Id 확인, 상태 관리 및 변경 내용 추적](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3bd49311-0e72-4ea4-8355-38fe57036ba0) 하 고 [POCO 엔터티의 변경 내용 추적](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/52d2fc77-5c87-4082-a8e2-a2952ceb8461)합니다.For more information, see [Identity Resolution, State Management, and Change Tracking](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3bd49311-0e72-4ea4-8355-38fe57036ba0) and [Tracking Changes in POCO Entities](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/52d2fc77-5c87-4082-a8e2-a2952ceb8461).
